short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for Run Directors or interested third parties to generate a nice infographic for sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension that creates an infographic about the results from a particular parkrun.   The infographic is generated when you visit either the latest results page, or any historic results page served from parkrun.org.uk.  Once generated, the infographic can be captured in a screenshot and shared on social media.

For example: if you want to see an infographic for the latest results from Portsmouth Lakeside, visit https://parkrun.org.uk/portsmouthlakeside/results/latestresults/ and the infographic will be generated and added just under the header.

The design is based on an original work by Ian Gregory at Portsmouth's Great Salterns parkrun #34 which has been adopted by many parkruns since.
